usecases.name: 30 days readmission risk prediction in complex chronic patients
usecases.description: Can be used in real-time during the discharge consultation, with the aim to inform specialists about this risk and therefore support their decision on the reatment after the patient discharge, so the readminission could be anticipated and avoided.

usecases.name: Discovery of disease association patterns in comorbid patients
usecases.description: Translates into economic savins related to the reduction of efforts in parallel research, and impacts on health outcomes related to the management o f this kind of patients

featureset.name: F4H Use-case-2 feature set
featureset.description: Contains medical comorbidities, pharmacological variables, laboratory variables and other variables

featureset.name: Feature set with small number of variables
featureset.description: Contains only heart and endocrine diseases

features.name: Feature set X
features.description: Contains 44 different comorbid diseases and others.

features.name: F4H Use-Case-1 feature set
features.description: Contains medical comorbid, polypharmacy, mortality, cognitive impairment variables.

features.name: Feature set Y
features.description: Contains only heart and endocrine diseases.
